history.proof: unfold Lim. unfold Lim_seq. sfirstorder depth: 3use: Lim_seq_const.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Lim_seq_const (Lim_seq (fun _ : nat => _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment a : R x : Rbar Unable to unify "Finite a" with "Rbar_div_pos (Rbar_plus (LimSup_seq (fun _ : nat => a)) (LimInf_seq (fun _ : nat => a))) {| pos := 2; cond_pos := Rlt_R0_R2 |}".

original: unfold Lim. unfold Lim_seq. rewrite Lim_seq_const. reflexivity.
